basics.name: Urban Halpern
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Hilo, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Conducted research in the field of human-in-the-loop machine learning.
highlights: Created an evaluator tasked with keeping track of the effect that the AI had on annotation efficiency
Visualized the total actions and change in actions done by the user
Refractored old code and fixed any bugs that were found
Assisted in remodeling the store by dismantling old fixtures and replacing them with updated models.
Fixtures ranged from shelves, counters, warehouse steel, cash registers, and television displays
Supported regular store functions such as stocking freight and assisting customers around the store

volunteer.summary: Participated in a multitude of service projects over the course of two years for a total of over 100 service hours.
highlights: Provided relief for people affected by the 2018 Puna Eruption
Helped with a Keiki Shopping day to provide cheap second hand items for kids in need
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Awarded to full time students that maintain a 3.5 GPA or higher.
